data.eml:eml: A new North American chorus frog species (Amphibia: Hylidae: Pseudacris) from the south-central United States

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lemmon, Emily Moriarty, Lemmon, Alan R., Collins, Joseph T., Cannatella, David C. (2008): A new North American chorus frog species (Amphibia: Hylidae: Pseudacris) from the south-central United States. Zootaxa 1675: 1-30, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.180286
